parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return the current gusts value. Scale is 0 to 1.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''gusts'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_gustsval = '''gusts''';
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setGusts]], [[windStr]], [[wind]]
</value></part></template>
